sentences.sCn: 他们还朝一个尖塔开了炮。

sentences.sContent: The mosque of umar,located next to the church of the holy sepulcher,features a syrian-type minaret.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mosque of umar,located next to the church of the holy sepulcher,features a syrian-type minaret.
sentences.sCn: 位于圣墓教堂附近的欧麦尔清真寺，有一个叙利亚式尖塔。

trans.tranOther: a tall thin tower on a  mosque  , from which Muslims are called to prayer
